thread.title: Carlos Hyde’s foot problem could be lingering issue for 49ers
thread.title_full: Carlos Hyde’s foot problem could be lingering issue for 49ers - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Eric Branch
title: Carlos Hyde’s foot problem could be lingering issue for 49ers
text:
Photo: Carlos Avila Gonzalez / The Chronicle Carlos Hyde looks at the scoreboard in the final seconds of the loss to Seattle on Thursday. Carlos Hyde looks at the scoreboard in the final seconds of the...
In the third quarter of the 49ers’ loss to the Giants on Oct. 11, running back Carlos Hyde came up limping after linebacker J.T. Thomas jumped on his back to break up a pass. Carlos Hyde looks at the scoreboard in the final seconds of the loss to Seattle on Thursday. Carlos Hyde looks at the scoreboard in the final seconds of the...
In the third quarter of the 49ers’ loss to the Giants on Oct. 11, running back Carlos Hyde came up limping after linebacker J.T. Thomas jumped on his back to break up a pass.
